item.title: Shell Script Tutorial
item.description: Shell Scripting File Encryption & Decryption Program This is simple program made by me for encrypting & decrypting the files This is a quick tutorial on shell scripting so won’t go in deep about every concepts but the over view and little bit of explaination. Let’s get started.! Alright the first line in the Shell script is called sha-bang that is nothing but #! anyway we aren’t here to discuss about sha-band lol.
